name: TestsByMicroscopicObservationInTissueByHEOrPASStain
title: Tests by Microscopic Observation in Tissue by H&E or PAS Stain
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains test codes for microscopic observation in tissue by H&E or PAS stain),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Microscopic observation 
Periodic acid-Schiff stain or Hematoxylin stain; Hematoxylin and eosin stain 
in Tissue or Unspecified specimen),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
